attributes.action: Revoke the decision by Keir Starmer for the recognition of a Palestinian state
attributes.additional_details: Reverse the decision and support the fight by Israel against the terrorist group Hamas and until Hamas release the Hostages and the Palestinians hold an election no decision should be made except the continuing support for Israel and only then consideration in consultation with Israel on the future status of Palestine should be taken
attributes.background: This is the most despicable thing that as a country we can do is to make Palestine a state which is rewarding Hamas a terrorist organisation which is irresponsible when it continues to hold hostages in terrible conditions, and as a country we should be supporting Israels fight against terrorists

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for a similar action: "The UK Government should not unilaterally recognise a Palestinian State" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738421
